casebody.data:
Leonard YARBOROUGH, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
STATE OPERATED SCHOOL DISTRICT OF the CITY OF NEWARK, ESSEX COUNTY, Defendant-Respondent. C-644 September Term 2018
081456 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001343-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
